MUSIC



I wrote this song for Ms. Agony. This song is a demonstration of what I can do with the sound. I don't use samples, I design sounds from scratch. It makes me think, I'm original. Have you ever heard Dubstep mixed with Waltz?

Ableton Live 9 Suite Miroslav Philharmonik Kontakt 5 Tornado Artillery 2

My first released song. Track I have created during my studies at Point Blank Music College as part of my assignment. Most of the sounds are designed from scratch, some rhythmic elements are bits of my recorded voice. I hope you enjoyed my little contribution to the world of music.

Ableton Live 9 Suite Miroslav Philharmonik

Short soundtrack piece I composed for my BERINGSEAVERSUS.ME promo video.
